title: recipes_Iowa_City_Oatmeal_Cookie_(Cocktail)
text:
Title: Iowa City Oatmeal Cookie (Cocktail).
.
Description: It's not a cookie, it's a cookie spice-flavored cocktail!.
.
Ingredients:.
- 0.5 fluid ounce butterscotch schnapps.
- 0.5 fluid ounce Irish cream liqueur.
- 0.5 fluid ounce cinnamon schnapps.
- 0.25 cup crushed ice.
.
Instructions:.
- Shake the butterscotch schnapps, Irish liqueur, and cinnamon schnapps in a cocktail shaker with crushed ice; strain into a small glass..
.
Nutrients:.
calories: 161 kcal.
carbohydrateContent: 20 g.
sodiumContent: 3 mg.
sugarContent: 18 g.
fatContent: 0 g.
unsaturatedFatContent: 0 g.
.
Serves: 1 serving.
